div.p: We hope this email finds you well. We are writing to gently remind you about the pending review of the manuscript titled "" for . Thank you once again for accepting our invitation to review this submission.

As you know, your expertise is invaluable to ensuring the quality and credibility of the peer review process. Your insights and feedback are eagerly anticipated by both the authors and the editorial team.

If you have already begun the review process, we sincerely appreciate your efforts and encourage you to submit your feedback at your earliest convenience. If you have not yet had the opportunity to commence the review, we kindly ask you to prioritize it in your schedule.

We understand the demands on your time and are grateful for your commitment to advancing scholarly discourse in our field. Your thorough and thoughtful evaluation will significantly contribute to the enhancement of the manuscript and the overall quality of our publication.

If you foresee any challenges or delays in completing the review by the agreed-upon deadline, please do not hesitate to inform us as soon as possible. We are more than willing to accommodate reasonable extensions to ensure a comprehensive and fair assessment.
Thank you once again for your dedication to scholarly peer review. Your continued support is instrumental in maintaining the high standards of excellence associated with .

Warm regards,
